1- enp0s8
2- 2
3- 192.168.2.254
4- 255.255.255.0
ifconfig enp0s8:2 192.168.2.254 netmask 255.255.255.0
1- enp0s8
2- 1
3- 192.168.1.254
4- 255.255.255.0
ifconfig enp0s8:1 192.168.1.254 netmask 255.255.255.0
1- enp0s8
2- 3
3- 192.168.3.254
4- 255.255.255.0
ifconfig enp0s8:3 192.168.3.254 netmask 255.255.255.0
1- enp0s8
2- 0
3- 192.168.0.254
4- 255.255.255.0
ifconfig enp0s8:0 192.168.0.254 netmask 255.255.255.0
1- enp0s8
2- 0
3- 192.168.0.254
4- 255.255.255.0
ifconfig enp0s8:0 192.168.0.254 netmask 255.255.255.0
1- enp0s8
2- 1
3- 192.168.1.254
4- 255.255.255.0
ifconfig enp0s8:1 192.168.1.254 netmask 255.255.255.0
1- enp0s8
2- 2
3- 192.168.2.254
4- 255.255.255.0
ifconfig enp0s8:2 192.168.2.254 netmask 255.255.255.0
1- enp0s8
2- 3
3- 192.168.3.254
4- 255.255.255.0
ifconfig enp0s8:3 192.168.3.254 netmask 255.255.255.0
sudo ifconfig enp0s8:0 down
